alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Beauregard Parish, northern Newton and east central Jasper Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stringtown, or 8 miles north of Merryville, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Merryville, Jamestown, Farrsville, Roganville, Harrisburg, Junction and Stringtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
